thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Paul Scaglia
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Paul Scaglia

author: Paul Scaglia
title: Paul Scaglia
text:
When I told Joseph the rental agent in Christchurch about my rough start to New Zealand and how the airline lost my luggage and a bad hotel experience, he knocked $5 a day off the rental charge for the GPS unit to try and get my holiday off to a better start. Car I rented was in good condition and easy to drive and good on gas.
Highly recommend Omega Rental Cars.
